titles.title: To amend the Arms Export Control Act relating to export licenses for firearm silencers.
To amend the Arms Export Control Act relating to export licenses for firearm silencers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This bill prohibits the President from approving or issuing a license to export firearm silencers unless the recipient end-user of the firearm silencers is the government of a foreign country or any person acting on behalf of such government.
